content: अध्यवसायः {@--1@} An attempt, effort, exertion; न स्वल्पमप्यध्यवसायभीरोः करोति विज्ञाननिधिर्गुणं हि <ls>H. 1.</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; °सहचरेषु साहसेषु <ls>Dk. 161.</ls> {@--2@} Determination, resolution; mental effort or apprehension; संभावनं नाम अस्तित्वाध्यवसायः <ls>P. VI. 2. 21.</ls> {@--3@} Perseverance, diligence, energy, constancy; तत्कोयं पदे पदे महाननध्यवसायः <ls>U. 4</ls> absence of energy or resolution, drooping of spirits; (with महानध्यवसायः as the reading, the meaning would be ‘why this effort on your part {%<ab>i. e.</ab>%} to determine whether you should go or not, hesitation’.).
